title: Suffolk serial killer Steve Wright admits murdering 17-year-old in 1999
summary_full: The 67-year-old pleads guilty at Old Bailey to killing Victoria Hall, his sixth murder victimThe Suffolk serial killer Steve Wright has pleaded guilty at the Old Bailey to killing 17-year-old Victoria Hall, his sixth murder victim.The 67-year-old had been due to go on trial for the murder of Victoria, who disappeared more than 25 years ago. He changed his plea on Monday and admitted her kidnap “by force or fraud” and murder on 19 September 1999. Wright also pleaded guilty to the attempted kidnap of Emily Doherty, then aged 22, in Felixstowe the day before. Continue reading...
